name: piratebay-scraper
description: Simple NPM library for scraping The PirateBay
author: BART! <bart@bartweb.cz>

scripts.publish:beta: yarn && yarn build && npm publish --folder dist --tag beta
scripts.release:patch: git checkout master && npm version patch -m "chore(update): patch release %s 🐛 "
scripts.release:minor: git checkout master && npm version minor -m "chore(update): release %s 🚀"
scripts.release:major: git checkout master && npm version major -m "chore(update): major release %s 💥 "
